entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 31.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
